description: Try our easy to follow Homemade Choc Fudge Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Homemade Choc Fudge Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place 1/4 cup premium cocoa powder, 2 tbs caster sugar and 2 tbs golden syrup in a small saucepan. Gradually add 1/4 cup water and whisk until combined. Place pan over a medium heat and whisk constantly until mixture starts to bubble around the edges. Cook for 1-2 minutes, then remove from heat and set aside to cool for 5 minutes. Transfer to a small bowl, cover with plastic wrap and chill.
